title: MPfree: Work Drugs – Dirty Dreams
content:
Philadelphia electro-pop outfit Work Drugs have dropped a new collaborative effort to in celebrations of the duo’s one year band anniversary. It’s been a pretty sublime 12 months for Thomas Crystal and Benjamin Louisiana, having seen their fanbase expand rapidly, largely due to the release of their debut album proper Aurora Lies a few months back. The two piece have also spent much time perfecting their live performance and crafting fitting music videos to accompany their ‘chillwave’ influenced tracks.

Dirty Dreams picks up on the instrumental work of Philadelphia contemporary Dylan Sieh aka Tours, and expands the track from there. With their wistful vocals and glistening synths, Work Drugs transform Dirty Dreams into one of their finest efforts to date, hopefully indicating that they aren’t about to let the quality of their music slip. Listen to Dirty Dreams below, and grab it as a free download if you wish.

Dirty Dreams by Work Drugs
